Articles.Content:
I noticed when I was learning Kerbal Space program that there wasn't to many good videos on How to do things in the game, or if there was, they were out of date.

So I had a bit of a go making a few basic videos, I think would've helped me when I was learning.

How to: Orbit

How to: Asparagus Staging

I also noticed when it came to easter eggs, people rarely showed the actual location of an easter egg from the orbit view. So as I explored Kerbin and Duna I made some videos showing exactly where they were on the planets.

Kerbal Pyramids

Secret Second Space Centre

UFO Location Kerbin

Face on Duna

So if anyone has feedback, it would be welcome as would enjoy making more in future and hopefully improving.

And for fun, this is a video of me when I was learning and I did "land" on the moon.

And a shout out to Ridgedog, cos I learned everything I know from him. http://www.twitch.tv/ridgedog/
